name: Moroccan Tomato Soup
keywords: appetizer, celery, spices, tomato, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 5 medium cloves garlic, smashed, peeled and minced
2 1/4 pounds tomatoes, cored and cut in 1-inch pieces
1/4 cup packed cilantro leaves, chopped, plus additional leaves for garnish
2 tablespoons plus 2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice

recipeInstructions.text: Stir together garlic, paprika, cumin, cayenne and olive oil in a small saucepan. Place over low heat and cook, stirring constantly, for 2 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.
Pass tomatoes through a food mill fitted with a large disk. Stir in cooked spice mixture and remaining ingredients. Refrigerate until cold. Serve garnished with cilantro leaves.
